plot: Osvaldo is a forty-year-old gloomy and lonely dressmaker. One day he is visited by an enthusiastic teenage girl, who comes asking secretly for a dress to dance in a night club.
title: Vestido
plot_es: Osvaldo is a forty-year-old gloomy and lonely dressmaker. One day he is visited by an enthusiastic teenage girl, who comes asking secretly for a dress to dance in a night club.
plot_en: Osvaldo is a forty-year-old gloomy and lonely dressmaker. One day he is visited by an enthusiastic teenage girl, who comes asking secretly for a dress to dance in a night club.
